thought: I need to set the parameters for reading the Google Sheet to fetch business flow data based on the user provided documentId and sheetName.
plan: Set documentId mode to 'id' and value to the provided Google Sheet ID.
Set sheetName mode to 'id' and value to the provided sheet name 'commercial'.
Leave filtersUI and options empty for now.
Test reading the data from the sheet to verify it returns the rows.
criticism: The current parameters are empty, so the Google Sheets read action cannot fetch any data without proper parameters.
